group_1.textRight: All you seem to look at is Madoka.

group_1.textLeft: I don't...know what you're talking about...

group_1.textRight: Oh! Didn't you notice?@[chara:301001:motion_0]You haven't stopped staring at her!

group_1.textLeft: No, I mean, it's not like that...

group_1.textRight: Aww! [chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]You're blushing!@[chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]*Giggle* It's fine.[chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]
Madoka isn't listening to us right now.@She's totally lost in all the clothes.
I'm used to picking up where people are@looking, because it's what a model does.
Usually, if you're with your friends who@you see every day, it's only natural...
...for your eye to be drawn to something@[chara:301001:motion_0:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]new. Like a model, for example.
However, you haven't glanced at me once!
I'm starting to get a little jealous of her.@[chara:301001:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]*Giggle*
I see...
Maybe there's something that@I can't exactly put my finger on...
Something that binds the two@of you together, oh so tightly...
But I can see your feelings for her are @genuine. She is truly precious to you.
Really, genuine through and through.
Your eyes are filled with such @kindness when you look at her...
I think that's probably what makes@me envy her most.
I hope someday... I too can find someone who@will watch over me with that same admiration.
...!....[chara:301001:motion_0]What am I saying?@[chara:301001:motion_1]We got a little bit sidetracked, didn't we?

group_1.textLeft: She always protects me from everything...
That's why I fight as a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: I see...
You're...
A really cool Magical Girl, I think.

group_1.textLeft: Which store should we hit next?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry...@I've actually gotta go soon.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for hanging out with us!@It was really great!

group_1.textRight: You guys [chara:301001:motion_0:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]look after each other, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!@That's easy, because we're so close.

group_1.textRight: ...*Giggle*@See you, then.
...She's gone.
Yes? @What's up, Homura?

group_1.textLeft: Can we keep looking for a bit longer?

group_1.textRight: !@[chara:200101:motion_201:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]Yes! Let's!

group_1.narration: She told me I was cool because@I wanted to protect Madoka.
I don't know about that.@But I'll keep pushing forward.@That's my only choice.
Impossible things are happening in Kamihama.
I'll make sure that I finally find@the clues I need to save Madoka...
